newsitem.title: USA: Indian Ocean cyclone strengthens, threatens ships.
newsitem.headline: Indian Ocean cyclone strengthens, threatens ships.

text.p: Tropical Cyclone 36S (Rhonda) is moving southeast in the southern Indian Ocean and strengthening, private forecaster Weather Services Inc said.
Cyclone Rhonda, near 16s/96e, is a significant risk to shipping in the area with top winds now at 110 mph. It will reach peak intensity over the next 24 hours before beginning a slow weakening trend.
The system will remain over the open waters of the southern Indian Ocean, WSC said.
